item.description:
Agenda:



  • Prediction Markets as a tool to increase information sharing in Pharma, Ragu Bharadwaj, MIT Sloan
  • Semantic Web for knowledge discovery - specifically focused on Health and Life Sciences - Rajiv Salimarth, GIV Venture Partners
  • Theories of Human Comprehension & The Semantic Web - Brooke Aker, Expert System - There are 4 basic theories children are taught to decode words and read. Coupling these with a semantic network provides machine comprehension for The Semantic Web.
item.how_to_find_us: Star Conference Room. 4th Floor, Stata Center
item.name: The Cambridge Semantic Web December Meetup
